title: [Epidemiology] China’s ‘bat woman’ virologist rules out Covid-19 virus in fresh tests on old cave samples

[Medicine] Vibrations of the protein spikes on coronaviruses, including SARS-CoV-2, play a crucial part in allowing the virus to penetrate human cells. Study found a strong direct relationship between the rate and intensity of the spikes’ vibrations and how readily the virus could penetrate the cell.
